name: Martinis
description: Professional screenplay management application built with Spring Boot 3.2.0. Optimized for Railway.com deployment with MySQL database support.

DATABASE_URL.description: MySQL database URL provided by Railway (format: mysql://user:pass@host:port/db)

ADMIN_USERNAME.description: Initial admin username for the application

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Initial admin password (will be hashed with BCrypt)

PORT.description: Port number for the web server (automatically set by Railway)
